text: Ke unaka khutta chan jasabata hindachana va hatachan jasabata kunai kura samatdachan va amkha chan jasabata dekhchan va unako kana chan jasabata sunirakheko chan. Tapa'i bhanidinus ki aphna sabai sahabhagiharula'i pukara ra mero noksani garne upaya gara yasa prakara ki mala'i mohalata namilos
